hillbillies.model.unit

Class NoneActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.unit.Activity
      • hillbillies.model.unit.NoneActivity

  • class NoneActivity
extends Activity
    The default activity for when an unit isn't doing anything, also manages default behaviour.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NoneActivity(Unit unit)
      Initializes the default behavior activity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Updates the default behavior activity for the given time step.
      (package private) boolean canSwitch()
      Returns whether the unit can switch activities which is true when the unit is alive.
      (package private) void reset()
      Resets the activity, which does nothing.

      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes the default behavior activity.

    • Method Detail

      • advanceTime

        @Model
void advanceTime(double dt)
        Updates the default behavior activity for the given time step.
        Specified by:
        advanceTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        dt - The time step to update the activity with.
        Postcondition:
        If default behavior is enabled and the unit has an assigned task, the task will be updated with time step dt. Else if default behavior is enabled and the unit has no assigned task, the unit will get the task with the highest priority from the scheduler of his faction. Else if default behavior is enabled and there are no tasks available, the unit does with an equal chance one of the following things: - The unit works on a neighbouring cube. - The unit starts resting. - The unit attacks an enemy unit that is in range. - The unit moves to a random valid position in the world which the unit can reach.

      • canSwitch

        boolean canSwitch()
        Returns whether the unit can switch activities which is true when the unit is alive.
        Specified by:
        canSwitch in class Activity
        Returns:
        Always true.
            result == true

      • reset

        @Raw
void reset()
        Resets the activity, which does nothing.
        Specified by:
        reset in class Activity
